name: The Magpie Job
description:
Life as a magpie king is not easy.  You need to have the biggest glowing thing that exists and those things. 
And you've just managed to get the biggest glowing thing you've ever seen, you just had to pawn part of the kingdom and your crown.  Now you have a problem, whoever has the crown is the king. The jeweler will hold it for 100 days and sell it, you only have time to buy it back. But where to get the money, you can earn money by working for him. Of course, you are still the king, so you have your responsibilities, so you only spend one minute a day on this job. Therefore, make the most expensive contracts and optimize everything you can.

We created all the graphics. For most music and sound effects, we used copyright free sources. Main theme Stock Music provided by JK_Production, from Pond5.

TEAM
- Małgorzata Stępień - 2d artist
- Krzysztof Tomaszek - Game Designer/Programmer
- Patryk Szczesiak - Settings and UI Programmer

PS: If you want to erase your progress, try click few times on books behind magpie in main menu.
